name: Black Iron Burger
address: 245 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

reviews.text: Local con mucho ambiente y buenas burguers. Personal muy atento y profesional. Vale la pena si os hacen esperar un pocoah! Y son bÃ©ticos oe!!

A True NYC Burger Legend: Perfection on a Bun! Black Iron Burger absolutely delivered on its reputation. This was, without a doubt, one of the best burgers I have ever had.

I went straight for their namesake, the Black Iron Burger (two patties), cooked to a beautiful medium well. The beef was incredibly flavorful and juicy, perfectly complemented by the savory, sweet caramelized onions. Every bite was rich and satisfying.

On the side, the onion rings were the ideal companion. They had a light, crispy crust and were cooked to absolute perfection--no greasy sogginess here! To wash it all down, the fresh strawberry lemonade was tart, sweet, and genuinely refreshing.

The entire experience was seamless, with service to match the outstanding food quality. If you're looking for a top-tier burger experience in NYC, stop searching and start eating here!
Amazing burgers with friendly staff in a convenient location.
Excellent burger and service. Friendly staff. Recommended
De trÃ¨s bons burgers Ã  un prix raisonnable. Belle ambiance, bon service et bonne playlist

At least a 9,0 of a burger! The Black Iron!
Great beef! Great Sauce! Great onion!
Excellent old fashion!!!!
Just Amazing all around

Had a great experience here! The hamburger was awesome â€” definitely one of the best Iâ€™ve had in NYC. When I was about to check out, I realized I didnâ€™t bring my card and my Apple Pay didnâ€™t work. I was really stressed and didnâ€™t know what to do.

Thatâ€™s when one of the staff, Mateo Paredes, kindly offered to let my friend transfer money to his bank account so he could help me pay. He honestly saved my day! Iâ€™m super grateful for his kindness and support â€” thank you, Mateo! ğŸ™

Posto favoloso !
Il vero Hamburger newyorchese.
Tanti tipi di burger.
Siamo tornati una seconda volta per mangiare nuovi burger.
Personale gentilissimo.
Buonissimo tutto.

Cadre newyorkais hyper agrÃ©able et authentique, burgers vraiment dÃ©licieux (oui nous parlons de burgers, mais lÃ  c'est vraiment bon et travaillÃ©).
Personnel chaleureux, frites aÃ¯lois vraiment dÃ©licieuses (a tester absolument).
Un incontournable du plaisir d'un voyage Ã  New York.

Mi marido y yo fuimos por recomendaciÃ³n de un amigo que ya habÃ­a estado aquÃ­ y la verdad que fue un acierto. Calidad-precio genial, la atenciÃ³n inmejorable y ademÃ¡s, son rÃ¡pidos y estÃ¡n a todo. Lo recomendamos 100%.
Burgers taste good but are microscopic

This place is popular with both locals and tourists. I got a turkey burger with well-seasoned fries. The staff is friendly and helpful, especially if you are a new customer. It was a lovely experience!
Best burger. That black iron but I will try another one next time.
Food was great ,had the All American burger, drinks were tasteful .
Burgers were exceptional, it was very busy but service was quick. 10 out of 10!!
Such nice burgers in center of Manhattan. Personnel was kind and welcoming. Had a really nice time in this restaurant overall.
Very good burger and the servers are really kind.
Great food and brilliant service
Great service, Great atmosphere and great severs, lovely workers. A great affordable meal for a holiday!!

Super restaurant typique ! TrÃ¨s bon accueil burgers excellents
Je recommande !!
Es war super lecker! Mein Sohn und ich sind spontan vorbei gekommen und wurden sehr nett empfangen. Wir kÃ¶nnen die Burger und die topped Pommes nur empfehlen!!

Good food but super small serving size for the price. Also was a little deceiving with their service. Got a burger and they asked if fries were okay. Thinking they were included, based on the phrasing above, we said yes. Come to find out it adds 5.50 for a small bowl of fries. So for $17 you only get the burger. Just something to think about.

Une pÃ©pite,  un endroit Ã  ne pas manquer pendant votre voyage. Les burger sont copieux et excellent.  Les serveur sont de trÃ¨s bon conseils et tous avec le sourire.  Nous avons passÃ© une trÃ¨s bonne soirÃ©e,  je recommande.
Mekan biraz karanlÄ±k sanÄ±rÄ±m tarzlarÄ± bu ama haburger yemek iÃ§in biraz karanlÄ±k geldi bana , hamburgeri lezzetliydi fiyatÄ± belki bir tÄ±k daha uygun olabilirdi

We loved this place. From the music ( EDM global ) to the atmosphere and absolutely delicious burgers and fries â€¦ the fries are brilliant.

Thank you Ray for your hospitality and excellent service. Kudos to the kitchen. Mwah
Grazi Mil

K & Dr. Pepper ( irl)

This place was very nice. It was kind of rustic looking nothing fancy and burgers and things came with no sides or anything. Everything was extra in cost.  I found it a little pricey.
But my burger was delicious and the server was very nice

I had in this place the best hamburger I ever had !
Compose your own burger itâ€™s fun and especially very tasty !!!
Definitely recommend this place! The staff was very kind and thoughtful. Thanks Sandy for a great time! Good beer and Great burgers as well!
Great atmosphere. Good food. Good service.
Black Iron Burger was a great find!   Delicious food and warm people!
Above average burger, good bar/restaurant ambience albeit pretty tight seating, and a gluten free bun.  Overall great spot.
Mateo was very welcoming and friendly. Food was great. My favourite was the truffle fries. We will be back! Thank you ğŸ¤©
Super hamburger buonissimi, ottime birre, musicağŸ‘ & sport in TV ad un prezzo giustoğŸ¤· cosa vuoi di piÃ¹â‰ï¸

PeÃ±a BÃ©tica New York... objetivo cumplido, ver un partido del Betis por la TV en directo, con la familia y con otros aficionados que se encontraban allÃ­ con sus camisetas y animando es una experiencia inolvidable. Un abrazo enorme desde Jerez.
Un burger Ã  la hauteur de nos attentes, la viande Ã©tait excellente et le brownie un dÃ©lice

Tout simplement exceptionnel !!!!
Merci a matteo le serveur qui nous accueilli comme Ã  la maison
Le burger Ã©tait tout simplement dÃ©licieux ğŸ˜‹
Nothing crazy, I was waiting for something more flavorful. Not bad but could be better
The food was good as well as the service. Our server Sandy was amazing.
everything is a 10/10. Sandy was phenomenal!! we are def coming back.
Our server Sandy was phenomenal, Iâ€™m coming back next week!!!
Amazing service! Upbeat, fun, good food, good drinks :). Raymond was fantastic :).

The food and service here are both top-tier everything from start to finish was incredible. Each dish was bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. But what truly makes this place special is Ray hands down the most phenomenal server Iâ€™ve ever encountered. He treats every guest like family, anticipates what you need before you even ask, and creates such a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

If youâ€™re in NYC, do yourself a favor and come here. Between the amazing food and the exceptional service, Black and Iron sets the bar high. Ray makes the whole experience unforgettable!
Obrigam a dar gorjeta , sendo que nÃ£o Ã© obrigatÃ³rio

Die Burger waren sehr lecker. Wir wurden sehr schnell bedient. Allerdings hÃ¤tten wir gerne noch etwas Zeit dort verbracht, aber wir hatten eher das GefÃ¼hl, dass wir Platz fÃ¼r die nÃ¤chsten GÃ¤ste machen sollten. Das wirkte zum Schluss etwas ungemÃ¼tlich. Wir wÃ¼rden das Lokal trotzdem weiterempfehlen, da grundsÃ¤tzlich alles andere gepasst hat

Sitio espectacular para comer deliciosas hamburguesas en Nueva York. Sabor estupendo y precio muy bueno para lo que hemos visto por aquÃ­! Encima nos atendiÃ³ VerÃ³nica. SÃºper amable y atenta. Muy cerca de la 5ÂªAv y Central Park.
Muy recomendable si vienes por NY.

Excellent burger! The patty was a good size (I don't like super thick patties). The fries are more string shoe fries (thin, long) and were fresh and tasty. It is a bar/pub with TVs and sports so if that isn't your vibe you won't like it. If you don't mind, it's a good little spot - wasn't too loud at the time. Would go again, it was delicious.
Seriously delicious Black Iron Burger. Was so not disappointed!!!!

I regret every time I walked past without entering. The food quality is top-notch with reasonable pricing. This place impresses with its attention to detail. The workers deliver outstanding recommendations. Everything impresses thoroughly.

I went here on Feb this year and I experienced horrible racism.When I tried to order a menu they just ignored me and served to people who arrived here after me. Even after order, the clerk was really unpleasent. Also, there was some seats inside, I had to sit just beside the door. They were so rude and offensive.

Another excellent meal at a Black Iron Burger!  We were on our way to Madison Square Garden and really hungry when we walked past this restaurant.  Itâ€™s our fourth meal at this chain.  The burgers were fresh and delicious. Excellent fries.  Recent drink, beer was super cold and excellent.

Food was amazing. It was also packed, but we didnâ€™t wait very long for someone to come to take our order. My wife had made her own burger and that was very convenient being sheâ€™s  so picky. I had the epic burger (ğŸ‘ğŸ½) perfect for me and also had a side of wings. The adobo marinade was a lot better than I expected! I did make a reservation but most people were able to come right inside not too long of a wait time. (Reservation was made for 7pm) I highly recommend give it a try.

The service was great from the moment we entered to the moment we left. The food was good but nothing special. I opted for the smash black burger and hubby got the chicken club sandwich. We both enjoyed our choices.

My only slight nitpick is that the music is too loud. It was like being in a club and I just want to easy and talk to the person opposite me rather than yell.

I popped into Black Iron Burger near Times Square and thought it was pretty good. The portion size was just right for me as a European smaller than the usual American burger but nice and healthy. The flavour was spot on, perfect for anyone who prefers quality over quantity. Only tiny thing was they didnâ€™t offer a glass of iced water when I arrived, but no big deal. Overall, a nice little place if you want a tasty, healthy burger without going over the top.

Iâ€™d read some great reviews about this place and went in with pretty high expectationsâ€”but it turned out to be just okay.

The portions werenâ€™t exactly generousâ€”not your typical American-style hearty serving. The patty itself was decent, but nothing beyond expectation. Personally, I wouldâ€™ve preferred bolder seasoning to really bring out the flavors.

As for the sides, the fries were pretty disappointingâ€”thin, soggyâ€¦ And the coleslaw is Bland.

Hate to say it, but I left feeling a bit let down.

Split the iberico burger and a special menu smash burger, cooked medium. Both came out dry and undersalted in my opinion. The smash burger had a better overall flavor due to its sauce, but neither hit the mark due to the patties. :/ Nachos also tasted slightly stale, as if they'd been sitting out for a while. Maybe it's because we came as a huge group, but I don't see myself coming back. Kudos to the server dealing with such a large table though, and apparently they have some Spanish roots. :)

Durante il mio recente viaggio negli Stati Uniti, ho avuto il piacere di assaggiare un panino davvero memorabile in un locale tipico americano. L'hamburger era semplicemente perfetto: carne succosa, cotta alla perfezione, con un sapore autentico e avvolgente. Il pane, leggermente tostato, era morbido ma abbastanza consistente da reggere il ripieno senza disfarsi. Porzione generosa e servizio cordiale, in un ambiente informale ma accogliente. Un'esperienza semplice, ma che lascia il segno. Se cercate un hamburger autentico e ben fatto, questo posto Ã¨ una tappa obbligata.

One of the best  burgers in NYC.  I tried the mushroom truffle burger with fries and onion rings.  The onion rings were also out of this world, they are home made not frozen.  Kindly friendly service and we got our food quickly.

This was a convenient place to eat by the Empire State Building, but that was mostly it. Service was friendly and solid, and the place itself is a bit dark, musty and on the smaller side.

I had a custom burger with jalapenos, bacon, horseradish cheddar, lettuce, tomato, onion, Chipotle sauce and horseradish mayo. It was good but not particularly memorable.

My daughter's chicken strips and fries had an ample amount of both, and she enjoyed it, especially their fries.

The burgerâ€˜s patty was the best Iâ€™ve ever eaten. The meat was juicy and the texture was very good. The food on the menu was perfect. It was so delicious that I ate two burgers. The staffâ€˜s service was perfect and not to mention the attitude of the employees.This review was written with a translator.

Black Iron Burger is one of my favorite spots for a burger in Midtown. The place is pretty chill, nothing fancy, just good vibes and really tasty burgers. I tried the Mushroom Truffle Burger and it was juicy and packed with flavor. The fries are great too, especially the truffle ones. If youâ€™re around 38th Street and craving a solid burger, definitely check it out!

If youâ€™re craving a great burger, Black Iron Burger is the place to be. I had the American Burger and it was absolutely memorable. The quality of the ingredients, especially the meat, really stands out. The spot has a charming old pub vibe, yet itâ€™s clean and cozy, with a solid selection of beers to pair with your meal. Prices are a bit on the higher side, but for the taste and quality, itâ€™s well worth it.

I was headed for an upscale restaurant on a random Wednesday night and stumbled upon Black Iron Burger.   As a single traveler it is often hard to feel welcomed at restaurants.   I headed for the bar and was so welcomed by Sandy.  He was extremely busy but took the time to let me know that they are the  number one rated burger place in NYC and that I should enjoy the food there instead of taking it to go.  I am convinced that they have earned that rating and totally see why.  Love this place.

First of all: there are quite a few promises about the quality and taste of the meat. And they are true! REAL good foodâ€¦ Very friendly service and nice atmosphere. But what I liked so much and found hard to find in NY: the music!!! Some really cool deep house, tech house and loungy house, never disturbing and adding to the experience, absolutely good.

Our server was very nice, attentive and brought everything out with a smile. I loved the fries. We ordered the chicken wings and the classic burger. Our burger was ordered medium well but it came out very bloody. It had good flavor just notâ€¦

Really nice burgers juicy and full of flavour. The fries are not something special and are not freshly cut. If they change then to fresh it will be a different experience. The service was excellent. Very fast attentive and friendly. I highly recommend this place

What an amazing place! The serverâ€”possibly the ownerâ€”was incredibly warm and attentive, making the experience even better. The service was top-notch, and the food didnâ€™t disappoint either. Portion sizes are generous, and the â€œbuild your own burgerâ€ concept is both fun and customizable. You get to choose your own toppings, and if youâ€™re going a bit overboard or unsure, the server will guide you with great recommendations.

The only miss for me was the chips and guacâ€”the chips were hard to chew, stuck to my teeth, and just werenâ€™t enjoyable.

One small but meaningful gesture stood out: we had added a tip, and the server came back to let us know that 18% gratuity was already included. He even suggested we could strike off the extra tip if we wished. That level of transparency builds trust and shows integrity.

Overall, itâ€™s a great hangout spot, and Iâ€™d definitely recommend it!

I had the burger with mushrooms and it was delicious. Wish it had sides that came with it like fries or something because I was still left a little hungry after but the burger was sooo good. I would go back just for the burger. Drink was good as well. Got a drink for half price during happy hour!
The services was great too. Very attentive server.
Music was lively! Shout to the playlist!
One thing I absolutely hated was the constant smell of cigarettes!! Idk if its because they had the door open the entire time and I was seated next to the door so got a whiff of that the entire time. But other than that, everything else was cool.

One of the best burgers I've ever had! They were tasty, juicy and cooked to perfection - everything you'd want a burger to be!
Amazing beer to pair with it too...!
To top it all off, the service was perfect as well.  I'll be back!
I had the Iberico Burger with the herb-garlic fries  - I highly recommend it!

The burger was juicy and tasted good, but unfortunately, the portion size was small and it didn't come with fries - you'd need to order those separately. For the price (~$20), I expected a more filling meal, as just the burger did not satisfy my already low appetite. I opted this restaurant based on reviews it received but it was very disappointing and it didnt come close to my expectations.

Black Iron Burger is a dependable spot for a great burger--it never disappoints. While the signature burgers don't allow substitutions, which is a bit of a downside, the overall quality more than makes up for it.

Some of my favorites include The Masterpiece, The Epic Burger, and the Mushroom Truffle Burger. Pair them with their herb garlic fries, and you've got an amazing combo.

The burgers are always cooked to perfection. I typically order mine medium, and the patties are consistently juicy, flavorful, and well-seasoned. On occasion, I like to build my own burger, and their turkey burger is a fantastic option--definitely worth trying.

Highly recommend this spot for any burger lovers!
Amazing little burger place. Comfortable environment, and the service was great. The burgers were delicious. Highly recommended!!

If youâ€™re craving a burger that hits like a flavor bomb, Black Iron Burger on 38th Street is the place to go. I stopped by with high expectations, and I left impressed â€” and full.

Letâ€™s talk food:
I ordered the Black Iron Burger with cheddar and caramelized onions â€” juicy, perfectly cooked medium, and full of that smoky, iron-grilled flavor that makes you want to pause after every bite. The bun was fresh and held everything together without falling apart â€” a small but crucial detail. The paprika-dusted fries were crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, and addictively seasoned. If you like a little kick, donâ€™t skip the spicy mayo â€” it brings the whole meal to another level.

Now for the service:
A huge shoutout to Veronica, who made the whole experience even better. Friendly, attentive, and genuinely kind â€” she made sure everything was spot on without being intrusive. She handled a pretty busy lunch rush with grace and a smile, which honestly made a difference.

Great burgers, bold flavors, and welcoming service â€” Black Iron Burger (38th St) delivers. Ask for Veronica if you want top-notch attention with your sizzling burger!

AvaliaÃ§Ã£o para o Google

AvaliaÃ§Ã£o: â­â­â­â­â­

A experiÃªncia na Black Iron Burger foi excelente! O hambÃºrguer tem um sabor intenso, com carne suculenta e ingredientes frescos que fazem toda a diferenÃ§a no resultado final. Cada mordida evidencia o cuidado e a qualidade na preparaÃ§Ã£o.
